features.description: A discovery platform that brings Wikipedia content to life with TikTok-style scrolling, audio summaries, and seamless search. Stay updated with trending topics, save articles for later, and share knowledge effortlessly. ‚ú®
features.astro: Seamless TikTok-style vertical scrolling for uninterrupted knowledge discovery.
features.alpine: Quickly find relevant Wikipedia articles with an AI-enhanced search feature.
features.tailwind: Stay updated with the latest and most relevant articles from Wikipedia.
features.localization: Convert article summaries into audio for a hands-free learning experience.
features.light_dark_mode: Easily save articles for later reading and revisit them anytime.
features.giscus: Instantly share interesting articles with friends across multiple platforms.
features.decapcms: Tracks reading time and interaction to improve content recommendations.
features.rss: Connect with like-minded users through discussion forums.
features.articlegenerator: Smarter content suggestions based on user interests.
